text: The image is a black and white surveillance camera shot of a street scene. On the left side, there is a row of shops with closed shutters and a few parked motorcycles. A person is standing near the shops. The right side of the image shows a sidewalk lined with trees and a parked three-wheeled vehicle. The street is relatively empty, with a few scattered items and a small cart. The scene appears to be captured early in the morning, as indicated by the timestamp.

The image shows a street scene with several shops lining the left side. The storefronts have colorful signs and awnings, and there are various items and displays outside the shops. A few people are walking along the sidewalk, and there are some motorbikes and a small blue vehicle parked on the right side of the street. Trees provide shade on the right, and the overall atmosphere appears calm and typical of a small urban area.

The image is a black-and-white surveillance camera shot of a street at night. The street is lined with buildings that have various signs and storefronts. There are several vehicles parked along the side of the street, including a small truck and a car. The area is illuminated by streetlights and the lights from the buildings. Trees with dense foliage are visible on the right side of the image, partially obscuring the view. The scene appears quiet and devoid of people.

The image shows a street scene captured by a surveillance camera. The street is lined with various shops and businesses, featuring red and white signage. Several motorbikes and scooters are parked along the sidewalk. A person wearing a yellow jacket and helmet is riding a scooter in the foreground. Another individual is standing next to a parked scooter. The street appears to be relatively quiet with a few pedestrians and vehicles in the distance. The overall atmosphere is calm and typical of a commercial area.

The image shows a street scene at night, captured by a surveillance camera. The street is wet, likely from recent rain, and is illuminated by bright lights from the surrounding shops. Several motorcycles and scooters are parked along the sidewalk. The storefronts are brightly lit, with various signs and advertisements visible. The area appears to be a commercial district, with a mix of shops and eateries. The overall atmosphere is quiet, with no visible pedestrians or moving vehicles.

The image shows a bustling street scene at night, captured by a surveillance camera. The area is well-lit with various shops and eateries lining the street. Red plastic chairs and tables are arranged outside, where several people are seated, enjoying their meals. A few individuals are walking around or standing near the tables. In the background, there is a staircase leading to an elevated walkway, and more people can be seen further down the street. The scene is lively, with a mix of pedestrians and parked motorcycles.
